short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically hide suggested videos & comments when using Youtube. Prevent distractions from interfering with your lesson plans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide on-screen distractions while presenting in the classroom or sharing your screen. Inappropriate comments and off-topic video suggestions can appear around any YouTube video; so while you're teaching long division, your students might be looking at clickbait thumbnails or joke comments. 

Because suggested videos are influenced by your YouTube history, this chrome extension also lets you protect your privacy while focusing on what’s most important: teaching. 

How to use SchoolSafe:
- Click “Add to Chrome” at the top right of this page, and you’re done!

Pause SchoolSafe at any time by clicking on the extension icon, and toggling the extension to "Off".

This extension is free to use and always will be.

Share this extension with other educators using this link https://tinyurl.com/schoolsafeyoutube
